plot: Young Australian, Barry McKenzie, travels to England with his Aunt Edna after his father dies and a request is revealed in his will.
title: The Adventures of Barry McKenzie
plot_es: Young Australian, Barry McKenzie, travels to England with his Aunt Edna after his father dies and a request is revealed in his will.
plot_en: Young Australian, Barry McKenzie, travels to England with his Aunt Edna after his father dies and a request is revealed in his will.

cast.role: Aunt Edna Everage /              Hoot /              Dr DeLamphrey
cast.name: Barry Humphries
